Name: Alien Accident
About the game: After being wrecked, the alien machine gathers people to replenish its fuel and move on in search of fellows. Since you cannot take off, you are flying at a low altitude and there is a risk of hitting oncoming cars, be careful. Alien Accident is a top-down race, a flying saucer and oncoming traffic. It is necessary to collect people for fuel. Do not accelerate too much, fuel runs out much faster. Use trampolines when flying over cars. Your people believe in you! Features of the game: - Difficult passage - Beautiful Pixel-Art - Unique levels
